title: Unbreakable
description: The life I live is a dangerous one:I am the wife of an outlaw.The daughter of the Unacceptables' President.But itâ€™s finally our time. Time to truly start our life. With our first baby on the way, Ryder and my life could not be more perfect.The club is doing well and the family is stronger than ever. But, is it all too good to be true?After all, I am their kryptonite and they will stop at nothing to protect me and my child. Can Ryder and the rest of his club be enough to keep us safe?
author: Kristen Hope Mazzola
